title: Staggering Smite
content:
ing Smite is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Staggering Smite is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Staggering Smite Information

Description: If the attack hits, deals an extra 4d6 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or have a disadvantage. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: Normal weapon range Requires C
